resources.string: The widget needs to know your location to calculate the position of the Sun. \n \nIt only works if you allow access to Location at the next step.
The widget needs to know your location to calculate the position of the Sun. \n \nPlease give permission to Location in the App Settings.
Please enable Location on your device in the Settings. After coming back, wait a moment to allow the system to figure things out.
The widget needs to know where you are, however due to performance reasons it will not request a location. Please open Maps or another app that shows your location, and then come back.
